Name: Omitted
About the game: ' Omitted ' is a first person psychological horror. The game takes place in an old abandoned hospital. Environment An abandoned hospital from 1917 filled with omitted patients. The player will have to go through the dark hallways and pass next to the patients in order to regain his memory about why he is here and what is actually happening. Storyline There is more than meets the eye when it comes to this abandoned hospital the players finds themselves in. Understanding and discovering the story will be key to beating it. There will be dark events, ideas, and a lot to discover. Gameplay There are puzzles and situations that the players will need to solve and maneuver around in order to reach their goals. WARNING : Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are Possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in a video game. People who have not previously experienced such attacks may not be aware of their illness. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.
